## May 2018 Ballot Comment 90

Submitted by @cmoesel from MITRE

Chapter: Quick Start
Section: Building an EHR Service
Type: A-S :bulb:
In Person Requested? No

Existing Wording:

1. Calls discovery endpoint
2. Invoke service on patient-view
3. Support for FHIR resources on request (context or pre-fetch)
4. Exposed non-secured FHIR server
5. Render card
6. Launch SMART app
7. Tested with external CDS Service

Proposed Wording:

1. Call discovery endpoint
2. Invoke service on patient-view
3. Support FHIR resource requests (context or pre-fetch)
4. Expose non-secured FHIR server for testing
5. Render card
6. Launch SMART app
7. Test with external CDS Service

Comment:
The list of things to build out mixed verb tenses a lot. The proposed wording uses a consistent tense. Corresponding section headers should also be updated.

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._
